title: Update 6.21.2020: Lila 5, PVK, Scott Adams, Guy Sengstock's Tweet and Quality
description: I'm busy working on a project for the next couple of weeks, but I can do some updates. Will resume the Lila series early July. Here I talk a little bit about chaper 5 and some other thoughts.
